net.commotionwireless.olsrinfo
Class JsonInfo

Object
  net.commotionwireless.olsrinfo.JsonInfo

public class JsonInfo
extends Object

Parse the output of olsrd's jsoninfo plugin, using the Jackson JSON library to parse the data into Java objects. Written as part of the Commotion Wireless project

See Also:
OLSR Configuration and Management

Method Detail

command

public String command(String cmdString)
Send a command to the jsoninfo plugin and get the raw dump back.

Parameters:
The - command to query jsoninfo with
Returns:
The complete JSON from jsoninfo as single String

parseCommand

public OlsrDataDump parseCommand(String cmd)
Query the jsoninfo plugin over a network socket and return the results parsed into Java objects.

Parameters:
The - command to query jsoninfo with
Returns:
The complete JSON reply parsed into Java objects.

all

public OlsrDataDump all()
all of the runtime and startup status information in a single report

Returns:
array of per-IP arrays of IP address, SYM, MPR, MPRS, Willingness, and 2 Hop Neighbors

runtime

public OlsrDataDump runtime()
all of the runtime status information in a single report

Returns:
array of per-IP arrays of IP address, SYM, MPR, MPRS, Willingness, and 2 Hop Neighbors

startup

public OlsrDataDump startup()
all of the startup config information in a single report

Returns:
array of per-IP arrays of IP address, SYM, MPR, MPRS, Willingness, and 2 Hop Neighbors

neighbors

public Collection<Neighbor> neighbors()
immediate neighbors on the mesh

Returns:
array of per-IP arrays of IP address, SYM, MPR, MPRS, Willingness, and 2 Hop Neighbors

links

public Collection<Link> links()
direct connections on the mesh, i.e. nodes with direct IP connectivity via Ad-hoc

Returns:
array of per-IP arrays of Local IP, Remote IP, Hysteresis, LQ, NLQ, and Cost

routes

public Collection<Route> routes()
IP routes to nodes on the mesh

Returns:
array of per-IP arrays of Destination, Gateway IP, Metric, ETX, and Interface

hna

public Collection<HNA> hna()
Host and Network Association (for supporting dynamic internet gateways)

Returns:
array of per-IP arrays of Destination and Gateway

mid

public Collection<MID> mid()
Multiple Interface Declaration

Returns:
array of per-IP arrays of IP address and Aliases

topology

public Collection<Node> topology()
topology of the whole mesh

Returns:
array of per-IP arrays of Destination IP, Last hop IP, LQ, NLQ, and Cost

interfaces

public Collection<Interface> interfaces()
the network interfaces that olsrd is aware of

Returns:
array of per-IP arrays of Destination IP, Last hop IP, LQ, NLQ, and Cost

gateways

public Collection<Gateway> gateways()
the gateways to other networks that this node knows about

Returns:
array of per-IP arrays of Status, Gateway IP, ETX, Hopcount, Uplink, Downlink, IPv4, IPv6, Prefix

config

public Config config()
The parsed configuration of olsrd in its current state

plugins

public Collection<Plugin> plugins()
The parsed configuration of plugins in their current state

olsrdconf

public String olsrdconf()
The current olsrd configuration in the olsrd.conf format, NOT json

main

                 throws IOException
for testing from the command line

Throws:
IOException
